name: Ball Battle - Multiplayer Online War Games
name_original: Ball Battle - Multiplayer Online War Games
description:
+ This is a multiplayer online war game.
+ All the players are very powerful.
+ Attack is a very good survival strategy.
+ Players can add the value of life by attacking the enemy or killing the enemy.
+ Hero will be upgraded by killing enemies.
+ When the hero upgrades, it will be stronger.
+ There are 5 skill attributes for players to choose.
+ They are the bullet speed, armor, life value, bullet attack power, the player moves speed.
+ The higher the hero level, the stronger the hero is.
+ The greater the volume. Looks very domineering.
